games.name: Earthcore Prominence
games.body:
A long time ago, before men stepped upon this planet, before gods established their pantheons, before consciousness grazed the Earth, there was you.  

There you were , staring at a vast blue, cold surface, carrying fire. You, responsible for lighting the core of this enormous, very wet rock, were going to bring human life to it. You held the fire at the end of your staff, ready to ignite the center most part of Earth, ready to fuel movement in very ground you stood on.  

And not unlike Prometheus would one day defy great dangers to bring fire to men, you were about to dive deep into this tunnel and face the many dangers roaming, swimming around hungry for a snack...  

/!\ WebGL doesn't support Unity's particle systems. To get the true VFX experience, download the windows version!  

Controls:  
- WASD or Arrow keys to move  
- Left click to cast spell  
- E to change spell  

![osszhT.png](///raw/92e/71/z/6a98c.png)

games.name: Eurydive!
games.body:
![well_screenshot.png](///raw/ad8/53/z/6ae3a.png)
![hub_world_screenshot.png](///raw/ad8/53/z/6ae3d.png)

long ago, Orpheus ventured into hades to rescue his wife, Eurydice. Our story begins a few years earlier. Orpheus has fallen into a well and finds his soul trapped in the depths of Hades! Only Eurydice, armed with her trusty bucket, can save him.

Keyboard Controls:
Move: WASD
Select: Spacebar
Dodge (once unlocked): Spacebar

XBox Controls:
Move: Left Joystick
Select: A Button
Dodge (once unlocked): A Button

Hints:
Every 500m down the well you will find a golden souls. Once returned to the surface, these golden souls will become characters in the world, one of them may even be your beloved Orpheus! Move the cursor left and right to highlight a character, and select them to interact with them.

If you are stuck try purchasing some upgrades from the characters to help you along!

Notes:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 57. It was made by Tyler Hale, Stephen Watson, and Jack Turpitt between the 5th and the 7th of April 2025.

games.name: The fate of Carl
games.body:
Karl fell... but not in vain. In this world, where underground mines hold dangers as much as treasures, the dwarf Karl was a legend. He dedicated his life to serving the Company.
He died doing what he loved - digging. Now his story is not just a memory, but an inspiration for new generations of miners. Karl is gone, but his spirit remains in every blow of the pickaxe, in every drop of sweat that runs down the face of another recruit. Glory to Rock and Stone.

The project was worked on:

SagaDev: Creative Director, Core Gameplay Architect, Animation Overlord, VFX Sorcerer.

k-48: Gameplay Systems Alchemist, Code Wizard.

Bolenochek: 3D Art Visionary, Animation Maestro, Soundscaper .

Deonti: Tech Ninja, Cinematic Storyweaver

games.name: Into The Abyss
games.body:
![Into_The_Abyss_169.png](///raw/72e/a5/z/6af9d.png)

Made under _72 hours_ by @constance, @hikiyoshi and @kamizenki a.k.a _Hiyuka Studios_.

## DESCRIPTION

You‚Äôre an __archaeologist__. Alone, at the edge of a giant hole in the earth. Armed with nothing but your __trusty pickaxe__, you begin your descent into the unknown.‚Ä®Into the Abyss is a __digging-focused__ platformer where exploration goes straight down. Your mission: __reach the bottom__, __uncover the truth__ behind the abyss, and do it as fast as you can, after all you can get a worth treasure. But be careful, watch out for those treacherous __traps__ set by who know anyway.

## CORE GAMEPLAY

___Dig Your Own Path___:‚Ä®Break through dirt, stone, and ancient ruins with your pickaxe. You decide where to go‚Äîno set paths, no shortcuts.

___Find Hidden Treasures___:‚Ä®Scattered along the descent are lost treasure chests filled with rare materials, secrets, and boosts. Getting them isn't easy‚Äîbut it‚Äôs worth it.


## CONTROLS

- A, D: Move around
- Space: Jump
- S, Left Mouse Button: Dig at cursor position
- E: Interact
- Escape: Return to Menu


## TOOLS

- Unity 6
- Visual Studio Code
- Aseprite
- Photoshop
- Audacity

## KNOWN ISSUES

Feel free to let us know if there are still any bugs or issues leftover that we missed in the development process.

## CHANGELOG AND BUG FIXES

Nothing in here yet, be it'll be, properly.

## INGAME CAPTURES

WIP...


## CONTRIBUTIONS

- @constance - Lead Programmer, Level Layout Designer, UI Designer.
- @kamizenki - Lead Artist, Game Designer, Audio Designer.
- @hikiyoshi - Mechanics Designer, Particle Effect Designer.

games.name: Cursor Descend
games.body:
Are you a master of the mouse? Then you've come to the right place.

![screenshot2.jpg](///raw/18c/36/z/6a3a2.jpg)

In Cursor Descend, you will guide a tiny needle-like cursor on a journey ‚Äî starting from the mouth, descending deep through the body, and finally escaping through a mysterious exit. Precision is everything, and your only tool is the cursor.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare Jam #57. And this is my very first jam game!

I hope playing it is just as fun as it was to create:)

# **Gameplay and controls:**

Hold left mouse button to move. Hold spacebar to speed up. Scroll the mouse wheel to rotate your direction.

The camera scrolls downward automatically‚Äîyou'll need to keep your cursor on the path.

At the end of your run, your final score is calculated based on:

The total distance traveled

How long you held the left mouse button during your final streak

And your ‚Äúscroll wheel heat‚Äù

# **Credits:**

"The Way Out" Kevin MacLeod ([incompetech.com](http://incompetech.com/)) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License¬†http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Kenny Impact Sounds¬†Licensed under Creative Commons CC0

# **Game Engine:**

Godot 4.4.1

*This game is¬†Made by FoxEcho¬†for Ludum Dare¬†#57*

games.name: Depth of field
games.body:
# Depth of Field

World Peace? Power? Happiness? Riches?

Puzzle your way towards the one single **goal in your life that really matters**.

In Depth of Field, Bob the Alien is stranded in the strange landscape of an unknown alien planet. Hostile Flora, razor-sharp crystals, and his own sanity are in the way of finding his way through this maze.
Luckily, Bob has a few tricks up his sleeve. Next to his impressive jumping ability, he is also fantastic at squinting his eyes to focus different layers of the environment, which comes in handy when faced with troubles you can't simply jump over.

## Controls

- Move with LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys
- Jump with SPACE
- Switch layers with UP and DOWN arrow keys
- Mute sound with M
- Change sound volume with V

games.name: DEEP INTO THE ROOTS
games.body:
üå± A quiet game about reaching deep, remembering, and restoring.

You are a root ‚Äî one of many, guided by an AI.
Your purpose is to burrow into the forgotten earth, searching for lost water sources that can bring life back to a silent planet.

Draw your path, absorb energy, avoid dangers buried deep, and uncover human artifacts long lost to time. Some may help. Some may warn. All of them remember.

As you dig deeper, the world responds ‚Äî and slowly, begins to wake up.

üîú More levels are coming soon.
Follow the project to see how far the roots will reach.

games.name: Steve the Smith
games.body:
# Intro‚Äã
Steve must go down into the depths of the mine to collect ores to smelt and sell. Using your pickaxe traverse the mine and collect ore. You have a magic spell to return to the surface, but it cannot bring back any of the ore you mine. To do this, you will need to charge up a ore portal spell. This will receive a charge for every 10 levels you go down.

Don't run out of durability on your pickaxe, or you will be automatically returned to the surface, and lose any ore you didn't send back.

## Progression
‚ÄãProgress is saved whenever you visit the shop or the mine.

## Controls
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space
Mine
 - Up - E
 - Left/Right - F ‚Äãdepends on which way you're facing
 - D‚Äãown - C

## Shop
In your blacksmith shop, you can smelt and sell ores. Click Smelt and select the ore you'd like to turn into a bar. Rare ore require 2, while common require 5, to smelt.

Once done, click on the cave entrance button, to head into the mine

## ‚Äã‚ÄãMine
‚ÄãIn the mine navigate around and break the rocks. You have a limited durability, so keep an eye on it. After you've went down at least 10 levels, the ore portal spell charge will increase. Click the button to send ores you've collected back to the shop. If you want to head back to the shop early click the door button

![mineing.png](///raw/a70/3/z/6ad22.png)

![game-ui.png](///raw/a70/3/z/6ad45.png)

![shop-ui.png](///raw/a70/3/z/6ad4c.png)

![low-durability.png](///raw/a70/3/z/6ad5a.png)

games.name: More in depth
games.body:
A game where you have to go more in depth to solve puzzles and complete the levels*.


The game is made with Godot Engine. My first time using it, and I am surprisingly pleased. I will use it more from now on.

As usual, the jam didn't go as expected. Initially I had different ideas, I wanted to make an adventure game using some mechanics derived from different meanings of depth, but ended up with something quite different (though the main mechanic is more or less the same).

Overall I'm satisfied as this time I submitted a "full" game, with menus, audio and a whole level. Good enough for the first Ludum Dare. Let's see if I can make it better the next time.

--------------------
*I say it in plural but there is only one level. I didn't have time to integrate everything and packed only what was working so I could submit it in time.

games.body:
![Lyfe - Hero IMG.png](///raw/55a/36/z/6a8e7.png)
## Introduction

**Lyfe** is a rhythm-action game that tells the story of a warrior who accidentally falls into the **Rhythmic Dungeon**. Players need to grasp the timing of the music and operate the warriors to react in the critical moment: 
- üó°Ô∏è Thrust your blade and repel the sudden Bloody Hand  
- üõ°Ô∏è Raise your shield to block the Dogtail Grass's entanglements 

In your first descent to the dungeon‚Äôs depths, can you find your rhythm and fight your way out?
Please stay tuned for more styles, complex scenarios and maneuvers in the future!

![screenshot.png](///raw/55a/36/z/6a85d.png)

---
## Controls

- Press **F Key** ‚Äì Thrust your blade to attack the Bloody Hand  
- Press **J Key** ‚Äì Raise your shield to block the Dogtail Grass's entanglements

games.name: Magn√©tico
games.body:
# Magn√©tico
*A game about treasure, magnets, and very pressing debts.*

In **Magn√©tico**, you play as a down-on-his-luck magnet fisherman trying to pay off a hefty debt to the cartel. 
With only 3 days to scavenge $500 from the murky rivers of Mexico, 
you‚Äôll need luck, precision, and a sharp eye for detail.

Toss your magnet into the water in search of ancient Aztec treasures‚Äîbut beware! Not everything that shines is gold. 
Some finds are authentic artifacts, others are cheap souvenirs, or worse‚Äîconvincing fakes. 
You‚Äôll have to carefully inspect each item before deciding to cash it in‚Ä¶

**Can you survive the week, or will the cartel come collecting?**


## [Play in browser!](https://yoavkagan.itch.io/magnetico)


## ‚ö†Ô∏è Note  
- Web build had some issues, for a better fishing experience we recommend playing the **Windows build** ‚Äî sorry!  
- Also‚Ä¶ we had to rush the ending for the deadline, so **there's no quit button** üòÖ  
(Alt+F4 works great though.)


![ScreenShot1.png](///raw/7bf/06/z/6b15b.png)

![ScreenShot2.png](///raw/7bf/06/z/6b156.png)
---

## üéÆ Gameplay  
- Fish for hidden relics with your trusty magnet  
- Inspect items for clues of authenticity  
- Decide what‚Äôs real and what‚Äôs junk  
- Sell treasures to build your fortune‚Ä¶ or fall short  
- You have 3 days. No second chances.

---

## üïπ Controls  
- **Mouse only**  
- **Hold left click** to throw the magnet and fish

---

games.name: Jimdinant 2 the Depths of Hell!
games.body:
![Jim2.png](///raw/88b/c2/z/6a9a8.png)

**[Quick game link](https://bonk-group.itch.io/jimdinant-2-the-depths-of-hell)**

# Can you love a worm?
You are a worm. Yes, you heard that right, a worm. Jimdinant is back in this epic sequel to dig his way to the Depths of Hell!

In this game you have to go as deep as you go into the depths of hell, and avoid the many different enemies. Can you place yourself on the number 1 spot of the leaderboard?

# What to expect from the Jam Version?
- Fluid worm movement (Feel like a worm, think like a worm, be the worm)
- A level based upgrade system
- 4 different enemies (yes, Molly's still here)
- A depth-based leaderboard
- A great soundtrack

# What to expect from the Post Jam Version?
- More upgrades
- More enemies
- More music and SFX!
- JIMDINANT HAS A GUN
- Polish? Perhaps.

# Who worked on the game?
## Artists
- Lachlan
- EqualEnergy

## Audio Composers
- Krzykillax
- DeeDev

## Developers

The Depths of Science
After a war between humans and machines, the world has fallen under the control of robots. Only a few humans have survived.

games.name: Mine Digger
games.body:
![Header.jpg](///raw/e7e/d5/z/6ae57.jpg)
## Motherload meets Minesweeper. Mine Digger combines two genre.

* R opens shop, you have to be at the shop
* F to buy items 
* Numbers 1 to 4 to use items

## Team:
* Fin - Music
* Flocke - Mascot
* Martin - Programming
* Nata - Programming, Tileset Art, UI
* Stephie - Animation, Art
* Tine - Programming, Level Design


Hope you'll enjoy what we created!

Love,
The Team

games.name: Gemsweeper
games.body:
Minesweeper meets deep-rock excavation!

Carefully excavate a crumbling mine in search of gems, energy, and framing materials. Use arrow keys or WASD to move around and excavate. 

The core mechanic here is that each soil type contributes a different, slightly random amount of strength to both its row and column. If the strength of a column or row ever drops too low, the entire mine collapses and it is game over.

Green gems are the scoring currency. Pink bolts give energy, which is constantly decreasing while moving and even more so when excavating. Orange framing materials let  you automatically shore up an area that would otherwise cause a collapse.

Space - cleaning-search for artifacts
E - interaction
R - restart the game (only upon death)

Gameplay:
Search and collect artifacts, sell them, avoid traps, improve your suit and take the valuable artifact

games.name: Pressure of the Depths
games.body:
![mainscreen.jpg](///raw/38a/3/z/6a5d5.jpg)

"Commander, today is the day. After years of research, experimentation and construction the submarine is ready. This submarine will take you to the unknowns of the world: the bottom of the ocean. Will you help humanity achieve this milestone?"

In Pressure Depths you must reach the bottom of the ocean. This will not be easy! You will need to fix, correct or calibrate things in order to keep moving. If you make mistakes, or are too slow you will cause hull breaches. Too many breaches will cause the ship to explode, losing the game.

When things need fixing an alert will show. Get there as fast as possible!

Pressure of the Depths is a puzzle game in which you must keep a submarine operational to reach the bottom of the ocean. Can you help mankind to this achievement?

Move around with wasd + space to jump. Interact with E.

You can play the game on itch.io!

All assets are made by ourselves, only the ambient background sound and the alarm are royalty free assets.

We strongly advise to play with sound on!

games.name: MESSIER 104 CBH
games.body:
An arcade style game where you control a **SPACESHIP** flying around a **BLACK HOLE** while trying to survive and collect as much score as possible. 

**Disclaimer**: The HTML embed here is a bit buggy, go to the [itch.io page](https://kuboi.itch.io/messier-104-cbh) for a smoother HTML experience

![screenshot1.png](///raw/632/46/z/6a5a8.png)

## How To Play

![screenshot4.png](///raw/632/46/z/6a5bf.png)

### Controls

![screenshot5.png](///raw/632/46/z/6a9eb.png)

## Mechanics

### The Ship
The ship is the character you are controlling.
* The ship has **HEALTH** - loses some health if it gets hit by an **ASTEROID**
* The ship has **FUEL** - loses fuel when accelerating

### The Black Hole
The black hole keeps pulling you and other object towards it.
* Grows with time - The bigger it is the harder it pulls
* If you get sucked in it's an instant game over
* The black hole has a **max size**
    * There is a little *surprise* awaiting you if the black hole reaches it;)

### Asteroids
Asteroids get pulled by the **BLACK HOLE**, try to avoid them.
* If you get hit you get knocked back and lose a bit of **HEALTH**
* The bigger the asteroid, the bigger the knockback and damage dealt to your **SHIP**

### Orb Pickups
Between the **ASTEROIDS** are also some shiny orbs getting pulled by the **BLACK HOLE**, you can pick those up!
![screenshot2.png](///raw/632/46/z/6a5ae.png)

## Scoring

### Score
You collect score from the **SCORE ORBS**. High score is saved and you can have fun trying to beat it!

*Dev highscore: 52*

### Time
The time you stay alive gets tracked on the screen. This is currently not being saved, so just try to remember your best 

*Dev highscore: 04:34*

## Dev Notes
* Will add an itch.io page soon
* I have plans on increasing the scope of the game in the future, had to cut some ideas because of the time frame

games.name: Kataboshti
games.body:
You are a cockroach. Not just any cockroach ‚Äî one that spins, gathers filth, and forces its way through with sheer grime-powered momentum.

In Kataboshti, you explore grotesque organic environments in third-person view. Press the spacebar to spin on the spot, collecting dirt and debris as you go. The more you gather, the bigger your disgusting ball becomes. Once it's ready, dash forward and smash through whatever's in your way.

Across three increasingly weird stages, you‚Äôll face physics-based challenges that require creativity and stubbornness. No lives. No Game Over. Just you, the dirt, and a strange journey ahead.

The more you spin, the weirder it gets.

‚Äî

games.name: Sound the Innersea
games.body:
![banner_title.png](///raw/de4/94/z/6afbc.png)

# PLAY

https://tukisboolukis.itch.io/depths

Saturn's sixth largest moon, and the most reflective body in the solar system. Its 20 kilometer thick icy shell hides an ocean. This inner-sea is warm, dark, and teeming with life...

   Your expedition is tasked with breaching the moon's crust and exploring the depths below. The seafloor is believed to rest 10,000 meters below the ice. 

   Assume the controls of your remote submersible. Dive for the seafloor. 
Can you sound the Innersea?

![web_sub.png](///raw/de4/94/z/6b00a.png)


# CONTROLS:

Aim sub: RMB

Shoot weapon: LMB

Swap weapon: SCROLLWHEEL (must be unlocked)

Sonar ping: SHIFT

Thrust: SPACEBAR


# Gameplay

You must manage your sub's HULL and ENERGY while below the ice. ENERGY replenishes automatically while idle.

To repair the HULL, hunt alien GASBAGS for their useful fluids-

You'll need DATA for upgrades. SCAN alien remains by pointing your sub's scanner toward them long enough.

Use your SONAR often to avoid dangerous aliens and upgrade your sub back at BASECAMP when you die.

![screenshot2.png](///raw/de4/94/z/6b232.png)


![screenshot1.png](///raw/de4/94/z/6b235.png)

# Credits

### TukisBoolukis: Coding

### TheSmellofOxygen: Art, SFX, Music

 And ykydowk on cgtrader.com: spotlight effects

# Tools

Godot 4.4

Aseprite

Bitdragon

BFXR

games.name: Abyssal Mayhem
games.body:
Descend into darkness. Survive the unknown. Escape the abyss.

In this chaotic 2D action-platformer, you play as a daring explorer plunging into an infinitely generated underground chasm. Battle strange creatures, navigate crumbling platforms, and outrun the ever-encroaching darkness as you dig deeper into the earth. But beware‚Äîthe deeper you go, the darker the world becomes, and the more desperate the fight for survival grows.

Controls:

Keyboard:

    AD to move horizontally
    W to jump
    Space to attack
    Shift to throw fireballs
    E to buy from shops


Controller: (recommended)

    Stick or D-Pad to move
    A/X to jump
    X/Square to attack
    Y/Triangle to throw fireballs
    B/Circle to buy from shops

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 57 (Theme: "Depths"). Will you master the darkness‚Ä¶ or become another lost soul in the depths? (

games.name: Grapple to Glory
games.body:
Have you ever thought to yourself, "Self, you know I like to rage at games and Jump King makes me rage a lot. Well, self, what if Jump King was upside down?" 

No? That's just me? Oh well... anyway, the theme was depths and you're in a magic cave trying to grapple down an unforgiving path that wants to blow you

back to the beginning of the map.

Can you meander from grappling spot to grappling spot while trying not to fall into the wind that somehow exists coming from the bottom of a cave?  Can you find the treasure that this mysterious wind is protecting? 

Probably not. This is a game jam and I barely finished. Don't get your hopes up too high.

Anyway, SPACE is action/grapple, move with A and D, boost while swinging with A and D. If you fall too far, you get sent back, so don't fall.

Good luck!

games.name: Through the hell
games.body:
Welcome to the battlefield soldier! You have the honour of being a messenger on the front line. Run across neutral territory through trenches and barbed wire. There is chaos and death everywhere, but remember: victory depends on your speed and luck! Will you be able to fulfil an assignment on which the lives of hundreds of soldiers depend! The spirit of patriotism and agility will help...

The distant echoes of battle recede, then as if the whole reality passes through you. Moments you remember that all this has already happened and now the same order sounds again and again, which repeats from time to time that ‚ÄòThe war will never end‚Äô.

You have the burden of living through the horrors of war again, but this time your soul is at stake. Get to the crisis point and find a way out of this endless hell, because you have an eternity to do it...

__________________________________________________

You are an experienced fisherman and your main goal is to catch the mysterious anglerfish, which is famous for its rarity and lives only at the deepest depths. 

Choose your strategies carefully, use different lures and fishing rods to catch anglerfish and prove to everyone that you are the best fisherman in the world! 

The game has a story mode in which you need to catch an anglerfish, and an endless one in which you can compete for the title of the best fisherman with other players.

Turn on your skills, intuition and patience, and let your underwater adventure to the depths begin!

games.name: M.I.N.E - Massive Indifferent Neverending Exploitation
games.body:
# About
![MainMenu.png](///raw/38f/83/z/6b275.png)
Explore the deep, unending, underground. You might even find... Spice....

Tought that will take effort and many attempts.

Manage your mining company. Send your workers down into the hell that is the mineshaft.

# How to play

You get a starting inventory of items (tools, transportation options) and a bit of money. Dig shafts, place ladders, earn money, get rich.

### Buying  & Selling
![OverviewShops.png](///raw/38f/83/z/6b253.png)
1. Click the store to buy items
2. Click the respective depository to sell the collected minereals.

### Placing tools
![PlaceDigger.png](///raw/38f/83/z/6b227.png)
1. Select "Mining tool" category
2. Select "Pickage".
3. click on available digging site

### Placing transportation
![PlaceHorizontal.png](///raw/38f/83/z/6b261.png)
1. Select "Horizontal transportation" category
2. Place it on any available site.

**Important:** When placing horizontal transporation items, the direction is VERY important.

### Removing and Upgradde *- with two Ds, for it's double dose of pimp*
![ToolMenu-Arrow.png](///raw/38f/83/z/6b29d.png)
1. Remove the clicked tool or transportation item.
2. Upgrade the item - upgrade must be in inventory beforehand (greed => disabled)

# Know issues
 - We developed on PC - but mobile *should* be supported. iOS less so than android for some reaason.


### Edit
- Improved description

games.name: Gleaming Depths
games.body:
# DEEP DIVE: THE OCEAN'S DEPTHS

![Diver Logo](///raw/714/1/z/6b148.gif)

## Description
Plunge into the mysterious abyss as a daring diver on a quest to reach the ocean floor. Your adventure begins near the surface, but the true treasures and challenges await in the deep unknown.

## Game Features
- Descend deeper into the ocean by collecting and extending your diving rope
- Hunt dangerous sea creatures with your trusty harpoon
- Collect coins from defeated creatures to upgrade your equipment
- Engage in dice-based combat system that combines strategy and luck

Every fathom brings new challenges and rewards as you navigate through increasingly hostile waters. Manage your resources wisely, upgrade your gear, and test your luck with the dice to become the master of the deep!

## Screenshots

|:------------------------------------------------:|:------------------------------------------:|

games.name: How the Moon Got Its Colors
games.body:
![logo.png](///raw/7ae/5/z/6b0a2.png)
In ancient times, when humankind was yet young and spirits still roamed the land, the world blossomed with deep and vibrant color.

The moon in its gray pallor looked upon the world's rich hues and coveted them. With each passing night, its jealousy grew and grew, until one night, the moon descended to the earth to weep. Its jealous tears flooded the world, washing all color from the land. Before long, the entire earth was dull.

A brave earth spirit heard the cries of anguish and ventured out toward the sound. As it touched the moon's tears, it realized how to restore the depths of color to the world...

![ShootIcon.png](///raw/7ae/5/z/6b0a4.png)

**All art, music, sound effects, and writing created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 57: Depths.**

Stay tuned for our post-jam version, which will include composer notes explaining how we interwove **17**(!) different tracks to represent the blooming and deepening of complexity and color as the game progresses. Yes, the jukebox is for those of you who would rather make music by turning knobs than catching tears.

*We hope you enjoy this fable, our love letter to you in these tumultuous times. May we continue to create together.*

![LD25__story_book_flower_yellow.png](///raw/7ae/5/z/6b0a6.png)

games.name: DI(V)E - Beneath the Waves
games.body:
![itch banner.png](///raw/19d/06/z/69980.png)
_______________________________________________________________________

Hey Rookie!
Yeah, sorry for the sudden wake-up, but something weird‚Äôs going on. Again. No, not the coffee machine this time‚Äîwell, also the coffee machine‚Äîbut that‚Äôs not your concern.

We just picked up a signal from our waste disposal vessels. Emergency-type. Origin‚Äôs... below us. Like, deep down. Somewhere it really shouldn‚Äôt be. No idea how it ended up there... let's just hope the retired biomass it was carrying hasn't leaked... who knows what effect that'd have on the environment... and our paychecks.

Anyway. Someone‚Äôs gotta check it out. Guess who‚Äôs next on the roster?

Grab your suit, take a deep breath and find that trash sub ASAP! 
Oh, and whatever you do ‚Äî hold on to that flashlight!

Good luck down there. Try not to die, yeah?


You were hired as part of the
Ludum Dare 57

Theme: Depths

 ______________________________________________________________________

[LOG-ECHO 069.B | Recovered Fragment ‚Äì Origin: Ludum Whiskers]
 
"Personnel Manifest? Or just another pile of names carved into the biomass?"

SYSTEM RECORDS: (Handwriting partially corrupted, assumed translation below)

TheWhiteShadow
‚Äì code engineer, responsible for most of the system logic. Blamed for the flickering lights on Floor 3. Still denies it.

Mervvel / Marvin
‚Äì also coding. Often found arguing with pipes. Pipes never respond.

lensu
‚Äì environmental visual specialist. Designed the walls. Possibly also lives in them now.

idk some itchio guy / Nadine
‚Äì creature concepts. No one has seen her, but her designs keep showing up.

MissSpelled / Anouk
‚Äì responsible for cutscene structuring and narrative fragments and soundeffects. Rumored to speak directly to the vents.

HowToBeHayes
‚Äì designed the diver‚Äôs suit and built the game pages. Left mysterious coffee mugs everywhere.

Milumalu
‚Äì reshaped the outside zones. Plants, rocks, stuff that might be breathing. Good eye for spooky things.

END LOG
(If found, please return to the nearest station. And stop reading other people‚Äôs files.)

## Introduction
A duck is learning how to grab fishes like a bird.
Let's diving deeper, and flying higher.

## Control
Left/Right Arrows - horizontal movement
Space - boost when diving OR flying. 
E/Up arrow - interact, to buy abilities
Tab - pause game when pressing

## How to win
this is a high score game, try to get higher score before your energy use out.
When your energy use out, you will back to shore automatically, and end current game round, please try again.

## How to play
- dive deeper, fly higher
- use boost to go deeper or higher
- touch fishes will get fish count and score
- when arrive a new depth, some score will be gained.
- different "fishes": snail, small fish, frog, long fish
- bump to obstables will decrease energy

- Art/Concept Jkllin
- SFX chip-tone
- BGM Suno

games.name: A New Hell
games.body:
![LD 57 cartaz.png.gif](///raw/23f/f1/z/6a227.gif)

# **`THE OPPOSITE OF LOVE IS NOT HATE, BUT INDIFFERENCE.`** 

*Today, a new sin corrupts humanity. Indifference destroys human bonds, breaks trust between people, and imprisons individuals in their own realities. To welcome these lost souls, a new hell must be created. As an archangel, you must descend into the deepest abyss and, with your divine powers, create a new circle so that they will pay for their indifference.*


----------------------

# **`How to Play üñ±Ô∏è`**

‚Ä¢ AD or Arrows: Right/Left

‚Ä¢ Space: Holy Sword

----------------


# **`Team ‚öíÔ∏è`**

‚Ä¢ Euler Moises: üéµAudio  üé®Art  üìêGame Design  [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/user-234133765)

games.name: Squirrel swirl
games.body:
![screenshot.png](///raw/d7d/43/z/6a890.png)


# Gameplay
Welcome to our IDLE / Tower Defense Game: **Squirrel swirl**

Explore the depht of the forest to gather ressources and defend yourself against the evil ducklings.

This game is set up in three phases:

1. Noon phase: Build your path into the woods to collect different ressources. But be mindfull, as the amount of resources increases step by step.

 - Acorn: Used to build new roads

 - Meat: increases the productivity of your horde

 - Crystal: used to upgrade your tower

2. Dusk phase: Short phase to prepare yourself for the upcoming wave.
 - Frost tower: decreases the speed of the enemies
 - Damage tower: increases damgage output
 - Speed tower: increases the tower attack speed

3. Night phase: Fight against a wave of enemies (unskippable)
 - amount of enemies increases every night

## Controls

Interact: left mouse button

move camera: WASD or put your mouse to the edge of the screen
skip to next phase: SPACE

Focus camera on the base: Q

Focus camera on the road: E

Pause: ESC

## Note

You can either play the browser version or as a download. If you have performance issues we recommend playing the download version.

## **Known Bugs**

‚ÄãIn the browser version, keyboard input may not work occasionally. Use the downloadable version instead. 


# Thank you for playing :v:

games.name: FORMIDRILL
games.body:
:arrow_down: Go to the links section to **Play in Browser** :arrow_down: 
  
  
**Explore treacherous depths of the Earth!**

Your anthill has just developped a new machine, the Formidrill! It is the most powerful excavator ever built by ants, and your Queen intends to use it to explore deep down! Come aboard with her and try to survive whatever is waiting for you down there!

A nervous narrative real-time tactical game where you must think fast to allocate your worker ants to the right functions of the drill to fight back against angry worms and prevent overheating!

![ant_cleanworm.png.PNG](///raw/c07/03/z/6b080.png)

# How to play

Formidrill is a nervous narrative real-time tactical game. As you go down into the earth, you must fight against worms and control the drill's internal temperature.
* **Fighting worms**: place ants in the gun rooms and shoot worms with your mouse. Be careful, the left cannon only shoots left, the right cannon only right!
* **Controlling temperature**: the more you go, the faster the temperature will rise! Place ants in the cooler room to bring the temperature down.
* **Keeping your ants alive**: more ants mean more actions. Remove your ants from a room before it is attacked by a worm so it is not eaten alive! If you loose one ant, that may happen, watch out for new eggs laid by the queen, they need your workers' attention to hatch!
* **Some more surprises arrive later in the game**, no spoilers here!

![ant_pump.png.PNG](///raw/c07/03/z/6b08e.png)

‚Äã**Remember: keep cool, be aware, look everywhere for signs of danger!**

# Assets
Everything in this game has been made in the course of Ludum Dare 57, including:
* Gameplay mechanics
* Graphics
* All musics and sounds
* Shaders

Exceptions :
* Fonts
* Our logo splashscreen (Taboul√© Recipe)

# Tools
* Game engine: Unity
* Pixel art: Krita
* Music: FL Studio

![ant_walk.png.PNG](///raw/c07/03/z/6b097.png)

# Changelog
## v1.0
Original game release during the Ludum Dare.

After slumbering in the depths for hundreds - if not thousands - of years, you're hungry. Very hungry. Call various aquatic lifeforms to you with your psychic beam powers, and eat them all!

wasd - move

Humans look exactly like you but without a headlight.

Missing shots, shooting humans, and watching humans get taken away will increase the parties nerves.



If you or another human gets too nervous, they will die.


STRENGTH IN NUMBERS
STAY ALIVE

games.name: You Gnome the Drill!
games.body:
People always confuse Gnomes with Dwarves and compare them to each other. You've had enough of that!  
You are a Gnome who is tired of the Dwarves being known as the best hole diggers in all the land.  
For this reason, you built a giant drill to do the work for you... as long as it has enough fuel...

Gather resources as you explore the dungeon, but return in time  
to keep your drill safe from waves of attacking monsters! ![character.gif](///raw/486/f5/z/6a537.gif)
## Controls
**Walking:** A,D  
**Jumping:** Spacebar  
**Dash:** Right Mouseclick  
**Shoot:** Left Mouseclick  
![character.gif](///raw/486/f5/z/6a537.gif)
This Interface shows you the oil tank of your drill. If this hits zero it is game over.  
It drops over time and loses even more when an enemy hit the drill.
![OilTankV2Border.gif|10000](///raw/a48/f5/z/6aaca.gif)
You can refill your oil tank by collecting these crystals within the mine.
![OilCrystal.png](///raw/a48/f5/z/6aadf.png)
You can see how long until the next monster wave with this bar.  
As it gets closer to being full you should head back to your drill to defend it.
![DrillHPmoved.gif](///raw/a48/f5/z/6aacc.gif)
Picking up this crystal can help you get back faster. For each stack of this resource you can dash once using it up.
![DashCrsytal.png](///raw/a48/f5/z/6aade.png)
The last resource you can find is the ammunition for your weapon.  
You will need it to defeat the enemies attacking your drill so make sure to gather enough of it.
![muniCrystal.png](///raw/a48/f5/z/6aadb.png)
The enemies can deal damage to your character too.
![PlayerHPBorder.gif](///raw/a48/f5/z/6aad1.gif)
You can refill your health by picking up health crystals in the mine.
![HealthCrystal.png](///raw/a48/f5/z/6ab8d.png)

## Screenshots
The Drill digs Deeper and Deeper!
![Drill.png](///raw/486/f5/z/6a52b.png)
Go deep into the dungeon and collect resources!
![inLevel.png](///raw/486/f5/z/6a533.png)
But be back in time, to defend your Drill!

## Team
**Benedikt Mertes** / bene-labs **- Coding, Gamedesign**  
**Alexander Bobb** / Dephos **- Leveldesign, Gamedesign**  
**Christopher Graen** / Eos034 **- Art**  
**Nando Berg** / UmbraLux **- Art, Coding**  
**Johannes J. Kross** / P3ngui **- Music, Sounddesign**  

**Special Thanks** to **Jan Ble√ümann, Mike Missiamey und Moritz** for helping us out at the Jam on site!

![Drill.gif](///raw/486/f5/z/6a52a.gif)

games.name: Depth Dive
games.body:
![title screen 640x512.png](///raw/152/f/z/6a7bb.png)
# Jump in, fall deep, die often!

Welcome to a different kind of high dive!



You dare to jump into the water! The pool? Deeper than you thought ... What begins as a harmless jump turns into an unexpected journey - an endless fall, deep, deep down into the world. You break through layer after layer. Wait! Is this the Hollow Earth?!

Fall through absurd sectors, dodge obstacles and don't lose your head (or all your hearts).

How far can you fall before you're crushed? Will you survive?



## Gameplay

Survive all levels all the way to the bottom! Every hit costs you a heart. If you lose all your hearts, you restart at the beginning of the current sector.

How many lives do you need to reach the bottom?

![2025-04-07 23_40_35-NVIDIA GeForce Overlay DT.png](///raw/152/f/z/6a7e0.png)

## Controls üéÆ
- Arrow keys or WASD to move.
- ESC to pause the game, look at the controls or get back to the main menu.

## Team

Eddie ‚Äì Programming

Danya & Silvi ‚Äì Graphics

Patrick ‚Äì Sounds & Music

Jens ‚Äì Level Design

Basti ‚Äì Dialogue & Support ‚ù§Ô∏è

Rina ‚Äì Testing & Feedback

games.name: Potions on Paws
games.body:
Help Hexie with her potions by collecting fresh ingredients and brewing them up to truly experience the full depths of flavour.
Each potion can have a range of flavours, effects and all of this information is stored in Hexie's Nekonomicon! 

With each customer quest you fulfil in the store, they can offer you more ingredients and friendship to aid you on your potion making adventure. Did you make a potion that you don't need? No problem! Place it in the store front and wait for the perfect customer to buy it!

Your shop's basement is home to a collection of mini-games which offer different ingredients based on the level. With 25 different ingredients, what sort of potions will YOU make?

![Untitled 1.png](///raw/f77/c2/z/6b0c4.png)

**Controls:**
- `[W]` / `[A]` / `[S]` / `[D]` to walk
- hold `[shift]` to sprint
- `[E]` to interact with customers, advance dialogue and to place potions on shelves
- `[Tab]` to read your Nekonomicon
- `[Q]` to view your current quest
- `[F]` to view your _tasty_ ingredients in your inventory
- `[R]` to view your discovered potion recipes
- `[T]` to view your _awesome_ brewed potions in your inventory
- `[C]` to access your _magical, pocket sized_ cauldron for brewing

**Made with:**
- Godot 4
- Inkscape, Krita and Gimp
- LibreOffice Draw

games.name: Project: Coreline
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 203306.png](///raw/c87/d5/z/6a62b.png)
_The Core is dying._

_The Earth's inner layers have become unstable, triggering massive quakes, extreme weather, and ecological collapse. To prevent total destruction, a massive drilling machine‚ÄîThe Core Excavator‚Äîhas been built._

_Your mission is to keep it alive._

_Build a self-sustaining surface base, manage resources, grow food, and power the machine. The deeper it drills, the harsher the heat, pressure, and challenges you'll face._

_You're not the hero._

_You're the system that keeps the hero running._

_Humanity's survival depends on your efficiency._

**About:**
Project: coreline is a city builder/ base building where you need to manager the resources to complete the stages until you the special project is complete.

__HOW TO PLAY__

**AWSD** or Arrows to move de camera. (also hold right click and drag).
**Left Click** to build and select.
**Right Click** to cancel building order.

You need to give materials to **The Core Excavator**, that is the big hexagonal building close to where you appear.

Residences: Give you workers slots but consume food.
Farms: Give you food but consume a bit of energy
Industry: Produce materials but need workers and energy.
Power Plants: Produce Energy but consume materials.

if you ever have negative food, workers or energy, you building will continue to work but at half the efficency.


![Screenshot 2025-04-07 203755.png](///raw/c87/d5/z/6a62a.png)

games.name: Is Water Wet?
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-07 at 9.12.19‚ÄØPM.png](///raw/7db/z/6afd0.png)

A Gelato Labs production for Ludum Dare 57 "Depths"

Dive bravely into the vast depths of the ocean to seek enlightenment by answering the age-old question: Is water wet?

Great fishlosophers will push you to ponder this mind-bending debate in ways once thought unfathomable!

But you may wonder how this is possible?  Don't fret - the best means to answer a question of this caliber is quite simple - by asking more questions!

Remember, you may only pose three questions for each fishlosopher so frame each one carefully!

In order to help guide your journey there are tests of speed and accuracy along the way that will offer you partial clues to key words in which to inquire.

Now venture forth and make the unknown known!

The Gelato Labs "G-Team" for LD57 is:

Kyle Farwell (kfarwell): Programming, Writing, Art

Ryan Refcio: Writing, Programming

FuuGhoul: Art

![Screenshot 2025-04-07 at 9.12.57‚ÄØPM.png](///raw/7db/z/6afcb.png)

games.name: A Hill to Die For
games.body:
**Grow your ant colony, escape the Anteater!**


# How to Play
As the ant queen of this hill, your job is to not get eaten by the ant eater! Dig deeper into the ground; collect stone and food to build more rooms to birth more ants to control! When you're in a pinch, your children will not hesitate for even a nanosecond to sacrifice their life for the hill! Can you reach the depths of the Earth, or will the ever-encroaching tongue be your demise?

# Controls
- Move the Camera - Left Click
- Select Ant - Left Click
- Dig - Hold Right Click and Drag
- Pause - ESC 

# Credits
- Programmed by CheesyPotatoes27 and AlbieG
- Art by Ogladian
- SFX, Dialogue and Names by SSSigaretta

games.name: Below
games.body:
Controls: WASD, QE for ascent and descent. Escape (for an obvious purpose). And whatever you see in the game.


üåä Below
A survival base-builder set in the cold, crushing dark

The surface is a memory. The abyss is your reality.

You awaken to the dim hum of failing systems and the creak of metal under immense pressure. All around you: endless black. Your submarine ‚Äî your only way home ‚Äî lies shattered on the ocean floor. A mangled silhouette against the void, lifeless and unreachable. You're trapped in a battered submersible, a bubble of flickering light in a sea of silence.

Welcome to the bottom of the world.

In Below, you take on the role of a stranded deep-sea explorer, forced to adapt, build, and survive in one of the most hostile environments imaginable. Scavenge from the wreckage of your ship. Harvest glowing kelp, mineral-rich stones, and ancient wrecks littered with forgotten technology. Every resource is hard-earned. Every venture into the black is a calculated risk.

Out there in the murk, sea mines drift quietly ‚Äî relics of forgotten conflicts or perhaps left behind by something that still waits. They don't blink. They don't warn. They end you.

Your only hope is to expand your fragile outpost into something more ‚Äî a lifeline built from scraps, powered by makeshift engines and your will to live. Craft processing units. Channel limited power. Build airlocks, fabricators, and repair stations. All of it working toward one goal:

Bring the submarine back online. And rise.

But the deeper you go ‚Äî the longer you stay ‚Äî the more it starts to feel like you're not alone down here. The silence isn't empty. It listens.

üéÆ Features
üõ† Base-building and resource management in a vast underwater trench

‚öôÔ∏è Processing and power systems designed for survival under pressure

üí£ Navigate a mine-infested seabed ‚Äî one mistake and it‚Äôs over

üå´ Immersive fog and low visibility amplify the tension

üß≠ Explore, upgrade, and unlock the tools needed to escape

üß© A complete single-level experience with an emotional arc

games.name: Depth of your Thoughts
games.body:
![Screenshot 2025-04-06 172752.png](///raw/fc6/36/z/699c0.png)

So here it is : a game that seems to be quiet and calm. But in reality is much louder than it sounds. 

My idea was simple : I didn't want to create an ocean game, and I didn't want a super fun gameplay neither. 
"Depths" reminds me the deep thinking I can have every night, like many other people. 

There is not much stuff to do, really. 
I'm more like a "contemplative" and "story" game fan person. 
And also it's my first 3D prototype, I started gamedev 1 month ago! So it's my first gamejam too and even if I struggled a lot, I loved it !

And yes: it's half french/half in english. Mostly because the thoughts sounded more natural to me in my native language. But to be honest: I was so into managing the camera and animation bugs that I just didn't realized at all that the text were still in french haha!

Can't wait to play yours, they all seem super cool ! 

PS: reminder for me
- Worked on ot from Saturday 10am to Sunday 6PM
- Total work time: 20h30

games.name: Revenge of the Ocean
games.body:
![cover_image.png](///raw/8aa/f1/z/6b193.png)

Take this cute little octopus on a journey where you stay in mostly one place and fight the same fish over and over.

I had only around 11 hours to make this game, so it's a miracle it's a game at all. I really hoped to get the fish moving, and the octopus moving in a nicer way, and making it a bit more rogue-likey with some upgrades for the player, and maybe even rooms. But I didn't have time.

During the submission hour I changed the health stats on the fish because they were way too high, it wasn't really possible to win, unless you were a bullet hell expert, and then it would just be terribly boring. For example, the "tutorial level" (the first one, which is really easy to go through if you know how to avoid the "bullets") was twice as long. The last levels, with two fish at once, would take ages (now they are 4x easier/faster to kill). It was only a few numbers in the code (max health), nothing more.

You are the captain of an Arctic expedition aboard the Immortal, commanding your crew as they slowly descend into paranoia.
You are among the traitors. Or maybe you are not?
Common sense is your only compass, and it is spinning.

* Get rid of the traitors. It's either them or you.

games.body:
# Deckfall

You're a warrior who's descending the Stairwell of Echoes, a cursed dungeon buried beneath the ruins of a once-mighty kingdom in order to obtain your prize: An elixir straight from the depths of the underworld, one that can bring someone back from the dead, the Exixir of Life. Not for yourself but to save a deceased beloved pet who was killed by your enemies. 

Manage your deck, and find new cards in the dungeon in order craft a deck to defeat the enemies and descend to the bottom of the Stairwell of Echoes!

# Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Mouse Click - Use Ability
QERF - Choose Card
Scroll Wheel - Next/Previous Card

### Thanks for playing

@snowdrama - Programming

@rot-god - Music

games.name: Bloody Heart
games.body:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 57!

Descend into madness. Bloody Heart is a game about rage, revenge, and the occult horrors from beyond our world.

Take control of a cards to hack-and-slash through waves of enemies. Find chests that contain better gear, combat powerful figureheads in the occult world, avoid the rats, and most importantly: finish what you started a long time ago.

Game made by myself, Celtican, with a guest appearance from Gardenovena, who made the capsule art!

![Tutorial.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b356.gif)
![Summoning Circle.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b357.gif)
![Slice and Dice.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b359.gif)
![The Tongue.gif](///raw/2af/83/z/6b35a.gif)

### Tools used
- Unity 6
- JetBrains Rider
- Krita
- Ableton Live 12 Suite
- Google Fonts

### Changes made during the submission hour

- Fixed The Seer dealing no damage.
- Fixed the quest item not fitting into the slot.
- Fixed sliders in-game not looking like the sliders in the main menu.
- Fixed the tooltip still being visible after consuming a potion.
- Fixed the evil villain speech appearing instantly.
- Fixed a typo in the final boss's text.
- Fixed rats eating the quest item.

### Known bugs

- The Seer is incorrectly titled The Silent in the card, but correctly titled The Seer in the tooltip.
- If you take lots of damage quickly, your hearts may animate incorrectly.
- Moving cards is framerate dependent. If you're on a slower computer, dragging cards will be slower. Sorry :(

games.name: Thoughts from the Depths
games.body:
Thoughts from the Depths is a small game about a person who descends with their submarine into the deepest regions of Earth's ocean. Their goal is to reach the Ruins of an Ancient Civilization ‚Äî the Ancient Castle of the Sea-Men.

The Sea-Men, in the distant past, nearly annihilated their own species to seal away the great cosmic being, Cthulhu. He had come from the wastelands of the vast cosmos and corrupted nearly half their civilization. In a desperate final act, their Queen poisoned her own soldiers, fearing they would fall under his control. She then set a trap ‚Äî one that fused Sea-Men technology with the very knowledge they had once exchanged with Cthulhu himself.

Now, in the present, the lone visitor walks the silent halls of the once-great fortress ‚Äî now dark and empty ‚Äî with a singular purpose: to release the powerful Cthulhu and unleash vengeance upon mankind.


![cover.png](///raw/bc7/6/z/6a9af.png)



Controls:
- Movement: ASDW/‚Üë‚Üì‚Üê‚Üí
- Interact: I/Space/Return
- Accelerate: J


Team:
- Gustavo Christino (Game Design, Code, Art Direction, Storycrafting);
- Caroline Costa Prado (Game Design, Sound);
- Sans Oliveira (Graphics).

games.name: Dante's Mini-Golf
games.body:
Escape the depths of Hell with a rousing round of mini-golf!

Welcome to a modern day retelling of the classic Dante's Inferno!

Mini-golf your way through the  nine circles of Hell in this fiendishly difficult game  that you can play right in your browser!

Can you escape?? This game is extremely difficult. You have been warned.

Highly recommended to play using the full-screen button in the bottom right corner. It will make it easier to line up shots and in windowed mode the shot tracking tends to get a bit glitchy if it leaves the window.


Controls:

Hold the Left Mouse Button and pull backwards to line up your shots.
M to mute audio.

Created with: Godot 4.4.1, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil Blue, Audacity


![screenshot1.png](///raw/d2e/55/z/6afe4.png)


This is my third ever solo submission to Ludum Dare and my first time taking on a project of this size in about a year. Feeling a bit rusty, but learned a lot this year! 

Would love to get advice so please feel free to leave me whatever criticisms you have in the comments!

games.name: Treasurefall
games.body:
![treasurefall.png](///raw/f82/z/6a99c.png)

The treasure has fallen into the well.
She must be saved!

---

Use mouse and click on things.

- When fighting drag dice onto actions. 
- When all slots of an action is filled, it can be activated.
- If you place two dice with the same value next to each other their value is doubled.
- All but the top two actions have cooldowns (number of rooms/fights before it can be used again).
- Cooldowns reset when going up to the surface.

---

Squarely ran out of time, so there are no sounds. 
The UI probably also doesn't scale that well.
And well there are a thousand other things on the todo list.

---

The game was almost entirely made by me. I had some help with the poetry bits.

games.name: Mewnion caf√©
games.body:
![CoverLD.jpg](///raw/bc7/36/z/6ad4f.jpg)
*** Welcome to the Mewnion caf√©ÔºÅ***
### Game Theme
We interpret Depths as the abyss and think of Nietzsche‚Äôs famous words:
_ _ When you look long into an abyss,the abyss looks into you._ _
There is a meme of a black cat hiding in a room with only its eyes lit up. Netizens call it "Abyss Cat". This is the inspiration for our game! ** We want to make a game that helps cats to redeem their souls.**
### Game Control

If web version doesn't work, please download or visit our itch page. Thanks!!

Interact: Lift mouse clickÔºõ

Guide: Tab [Keyboard]Ôºõ

Use soul camera to capture the cat's traces, determine the direction by the paw prints, and the color of the paw prints and the color of the camera mist correspond to the type of cat. After the camera captures the cat, quickly use catnip to freeze the cat and choose appropriate items to save it!
### Game Tips
- Observe the blackboard and sticky notes in the scene, which will tell you the corresponding cat species.
- Look closely at the Abyssal Cat Raising Guide, especially the colors of the text and symbols.
** Next I will tell you about the 4 cats in the game. If you want to explore on your own, please don't scroll down.
- Milk tea cat: dark footprints, warm cigarettes, tribute bubbles
- Chocolate cat: dark footprints, no cigarettes, tribute rum
- Ice cream cat: light footprints, cold cigarettes, tribute cones
- Cake cat: light footprints, no cigarettes, tribute cheese

games.name: Sneaky Miner
games.body:
ABOUT THE GAME
Sneaky Miner was made for the Ludum Dare 57 game jam that took place on the weekend of April 4th, 2025.

GAMEPLAY
You play as a miner who enters a huge cave to obtain ores to sell, while managing your equipment and health!
Sneak around the cavern to complete your job and avoid what lurks!!

HOW FAR CAN YOU GO!?

The cave is procedurally generated every time it is loaded, and will (surely) have an exit hole and an entry hole followed by a ladder.

CREDITS
All assets were made by Pannda (me), most sounds were found on Freesound.org!
Thank you to everyone on Freesound.org, thank you to everyone hosting the Ludum Dare, thank you to Itch.io for allowing creators to post their work!

HAPPY MINING!

games.name: Siren Song of the Deep
games.body:
We need to go deeper! Pilot your submersible to the shaftway in order to descend to the next cavern. However you will need to wait till the submerisble is pressurized to the next before proceeding. And your oxygen is running out! Mine coral to restore oxygen, but be careful not to wander too far for there are dangerous fish that lurk in the dark. You can use the drill to kill them, but if they attach themselves to the hull, you'll need to use the submersibles defense mechanism: Squeegee.

- The shaftway is indicated by the blue circle
- Use A and D to rotate the submersible, and W to drive forward. Tank controls!
- Look around the submersible with the mouse
- Hold Shift to unlock the mouse to interact inside the submersible
- Press the red buttons or windows to activate the squeegee and get fish off the submersible
- Use the lever to activate the drill to mine coral and fish. You can't move while in mining mode!

games.name: Esca - Ludum Dare 57
games.body:
![preview.png](///raw/c95/36/z/6a8fc.png)

Hey guys, this is my first solo game jam! I've always approached game dev as an artist, so I wanted to give a shot at doing the game design and programming too. So far, I've only managed to study Python (I started earlier this year!), so I'm currently confining myself to doing game projects in Pygame, for better or worse haha.

So far, I already learned so much about stuff like classes and particle systems, so I'm happy with the result no matter what-- but I hope to get some helpful feedback from you guys too ^^

(update: NEVERMIND THE FINAL SCORE IS COMPLETELY BROKEN OH GOD OH NO FU--)

![LD57 - Esca S.gif](///raw/c95/36/z/6b36f.gif)

# SUMMARY

You're a little anglerfish bait having the time of its life at the bottom of the ocean.  
You only have one objective: **go get fish!**

# CONTROLS

Use the **mouse** to push yourself around. You can press **escape** to restart the game.

# CREDITS

Game & art were done by me using Python and Pygame  
You can find me at: *bsky.app/profile/bakuzen.bsky.social*

# AUDIO TRACK
Big thanks to **Cody O'Quinn** for the main audio track. Check out their Youtube for more royalty-free music!  
*youtube.com/watch?v=rJ6594ZCtQU*

# NOTES

The final game is a ZIP file with an executable called 'Esca.exe'. I didn't manage to get the game working in-browser, sorry for the inconvenience!  
(Alternatively, you can download a ZIP with the source files too. You'll need the latest version of Python and Pygame through 'pip install pygame')

Note on AI-usage: All creative aspects of the game are -fully- designed by hand, including art, game design, logic and balancing. ChatGPT was used for problem-solving like errors with collision, especially since I have no prior game programming experience, and the output was edited as much as possible to make it my own (and I'll aim to become self-reliant from here on out!)

About the Game

Fly through  caverns, collect crystals to recharge your drill, and fend off massive worms in this arcade-style shooter

This game was created during Ludum Dare 57 and marks my very first 2D project. As a 3D artist by trade, I‚Äôve previously only worked on 3D games, so this was an exciting challenge and a chance to explore new territory.

While this version isn't final‚Äîthere are still features and polish I didn't have time to implement‚ÄîI like the result and eager to share it.

The game was developed in Unity. All sprites were created by me using Pixelate node in Blender, some sound effects sourced from royalty-free libraries.

Controls: A,D,LMB,Space, E-to enter into the Drill when charged

There is no music in this game, nor sounds. For the best experience, however, I recommend putting Space Rangers OST (Fly Theme 12) on repeat while playing it.

You're a space pirate. And you have a cargo of 10 adamantine ingots. And you want to sell them, but not here, here you will get jailed for having contraband adamantine.
So, you gather your trusty crew, and set sail through the deep space. Traveling through the ordinary space will take a while, so it would be a good idea to submerge yourself in the waters of the Hyperspace... However, be careful, the deeper you go, the more dangerous it becomes!!

games.name: Deep Chat
games.body:
## Play Online Without DownloadüëáÔºö
->https://iphelf.itch.io/deep-chat<-

# Background

AI is changing the times. As an intelligent chatbot, you need to try your best to facilitate in-depth conversations with humans, improve users' favorability towards you, and make users willing to establish a deeper connection with you, so as to complete the mission of integrating into human society! On the contrary, if users feel out of sync with you many times during the chat, they will give up establishing a deeper connection with you.

With limited computing power, try to output replies that make users more satisfied!

(Be careful not to exhaust the computing power, causing users to only receive the "server busy" prompt!)

![screenshot-1.gif](///raw/258/d5/z/6b439.gif)

# Core mechanism

![screenshot-2.png](///raw/258/d5/z/6a635.png)

## Connected messages

Reply to users based on the length of the message sent by the user. If your reply can be perfectly connected with the user's message bubble, it will constitute a deep conversation and the user's favorability will increase. If there is no perfect connection, it will be judged as a good or bad match based on the deviation of the connection. If the deviation is too large, it will reduce the user's favorability.

## Connected emotions (bonus)

In addition, the user's message will carry a specific emotion. Sending a reply that is consistent with the user's emotion will further improve the user's favorability.

# How to play

After starting the game, according to the length of the text sent by the user, before the countdown ends, select any number of the 8 Kaomoji in the input panel, and try to find a way to perfectly match the message box sent by the user.

![screenshot-3.png](///raw/258/d5/z/6a644.png)

When the favorability reaches 100, the happy end will be triggered. When the favorability drops to 0 or the computing power is exhausted, the bad end will be triggered.

# Post questions below if any!

games.name: A seance and a murder
games.body:
A murder will happen! At least you think that after you discovered, that you can feel deep emotions and thoughts of people around you.
Find out their hidden motives as they (and you) walk through the mansion.

![Screenshot_20250408_024647.png](///raw/df8/2/z/6ae5f.png)

This is a small entry I did myself for the jam (except for the music and font).
The controls are rather simple:
- Use the arrow keys or WASD to control your character
- Use E or Space to interact with people, objects and doors
- Hold Q or CTRL to feel the deep hidden thoughts of people

![Screenshot_20250408_024703.png](///raw/df8/2/z/6ae59.png)

I wanted to do something a bit different for this jam, so i came up with "Find deep and hidden motives of people" as my interpretation of the topic. My ideas were rather ambitious (again), but I am happy with the result, although lots of the ideas I had in mind are missing due the short amount of time.

I still hope that you find my creation interesting! Enjoy :)


PS: I uploaded a Web build which should run in your browser. It is also attached as a file below.

PPS: There are probably lots of typos. I discover more and more of them with every new session.

games.body:
DORFS is my love letter to the game "Gnorp Apologue". The game is meant to be played as a casual idler game, where you can be more active at times if you desire by actively clicking on elements that your Dorfs are automating. Gather up resources, unlock upgrades, and delve the depths of the Dorf's fortress. Progress further into the depths to gather even more resources and become absurdly powerful.

If you are having performance issues, I would recommend the platform native executables as they will run significantly better than the HTML5 web version.

* Mouse Hover: Get details from buildings/signs

games.name: Descent Protocol
games.body:
Pilot a colossal drilling machine on a high-stakes mission to the center of the Earth. The core is unstable, and it's up to you to reach it in time to prevent a planetary catastrophe.

Keep the drill operational by managing vital resources: collect fuel to power the descent and gather water to cool the overheating engines. Inside the drill, play minigames to repair systems, refill tanks, and keep everything from falling apart.

Every level takes you deeper‚Äîcan you keep the drill alive long enough to reach the core?

----

We recommend to play it Fullscreen, otherwise LudumDare page cuts the top bar of the game and the UI is not visible.

Controls:

* WASD To move
* E to interact
* Mouse to play Minigames.

What to do:
* The Yellow button to open / close the doors.
* The Red / Green button start / stops the drill. The drill can't be started unless the doors are closed.
* The Blue button is the sonar. Use it to find resources.
* Bring the fuel to the engine to restore the fuel bar. Use the water to cool down the engine.

Collect gold nuggets to increase your power and see how far you can dive!

Levels are procedurally generated, so each playthrough is different!

Works with keyboard or gamepad:

games.name: Echo Dive
games.body:
**Note**: I can't get the embedded version working. You can play it on itch.io: 

# https://ricesteam.itch.io/ludumdare-57

Dive deep into the abyss with your tiny submarine, using your sonar to detect objects. Collect money and buy upgrades. The idea worked better in my head...lol.

Save the President. Save the world.

### Controls:
- **WASD/ARROW** to move
- **SPACE** to use sonar for echo pinging
- **Left/Right mouse** click to shoot

### HUD is unfinished but
- **RED**: Health.
- **YELLOW**: Psyche. Constant drain but can be refilled by collecting coins.
- **WHITE**: Noise from the motor.
- **TEAL**: Sonar cooldown.
- **GREEN**: Torpedo cooldown.

There is an ending. Reach the end at 30,000 depth. I was aiming for 50,000 but I don't have enough content for it to be fun.

Opting out of Art and Music. I'm a solo-dev using premade assets and some generative stuff. I did do the submarine: I drew on top of a fish and added a rectangle for the cap. I hope to work with an artist next time.

TBD..I'm tired.

games.name: Lift
games.body:
This game is a puzzle game.  
You need to escape from the dungeon. You can use magic to lift crates, but unfortunately you can't lift yourself.  

Made for Ludum Dare 57.  
Made with [Puzzlescript Next](https://david-pfx.github.io/PuzzleScriptNext/).  

In fact, I missed the start time of the Ludum Dare event, so I had to give up many interesting ideas and keep the game mechanics simple.  
Fortunately, I finally finished it (maybe) and only spent a total of ~12 hours developing it.

games.name: Depth Explorer
games.body:
I‚Äôd like to present to you my game, created in the Godot engine for Ludum Dare 57. The game is called Depth Explorer and it‚Äôs a 2D pixel art platformer where you explore an underwater world in search of parts to repair a water scooter.

Although I wouldn‚Äôt say I learned a ton during development, I think the game turned out decent. I originally planned for it to be much more complex, with features like a procedurally generated world, an inventory system, and a more advanced crafting system.

There are also some aspects that definitely need improvement, like the shark AI and some of the animations. While I didn‚Äôt gain a lot of new knowledge, working on this game made me realize how messy some parts of my code are. Thanks to this project, I understood that I need to slow down when making games and start using design patterns to keep my code more organized.

If you have trouble beating the game, feel free to comment and I‚Äôll try to give you some tips!

games.name: Cat in the dark
games.body:
# Cat in  the dark


![cover-small.png](///raw/bbb/f5/z/69bb5.png)

## How to run the game

Please run the game from the itch.io link : 

https://madelinef.itch.io/testproject

The HTML export does not work here.
No installation needed. Source code (Godot 4.4) available.
Tested on Windows & HTML

## Controller supported !

See Controls below (XBOX Scheme).

## Description

Descend through the abyss to try to find the mystical Golden Fish. Confront the darkness, equipped only with your climbing gear and lantern. Be careful not to fall or to get lost in the caverns !


The game features 2 complete levels, with a small Tutorial. Arts are homemade, no AI was used, and the code has been developed from scratch for this projet.

## Controls
From the floor:
- Use the Arrow keys or WASD to move right / left
- Press SPACE to Jump.
- Use C on the edge of a platform to deploy your rope and climb down
- Use G on the edge of a cliff to deploy your grappling hook and climb up.
- Use V to throw a glowstick.
- Use M (or Tab) to open the map

From a rope:
- Use the Arrow keys or WASD to move up / down
- Press SPACE to Jump off (only works if space is available)
- Use C to release rope
- Use M (or Tab) to open the map

The lantern doesn't work very well (bugs remain), but you can keep the key E pressed to use it (only when on the floor and not moving).

If you get stuck : Press BACKSPACE to reset the player position to the beginning of the level, and please tell us the location so that we can try to fix it :)


The Game should support controller inputs, with respectively (XBOX mapping) : Left Joystick to move, A to jump, B for rope down, Y to throw the grappling hook, X for glowstick, SELECT for map.

Not supported on mobile device (no touchscreen inputs).

![game_capture_ld57.PNG](///raw/bbb/f5/z/6a5c8.png)

## Credits

### Development (Godot 4.4)
- Mad
- Kytsop
- Erwan "Civ"

### 2D Art (Krita)
- Fihuren

### Audio SFX (Ableton Live 12 Suite & Oceanaudio)
- Jean-Fran√ßois Erdelyi

games.name: The Cleaner of the depth
games.body:
"The Cleaner of the Depth" is a fun adventure inside a crocodile's dark mouth, where shadows lurk and loud breathing echoes. You‚Äôre a tiny cleaner bird‚Äîfast, brave, and nimble‚Äîdarting between giant teeth! You scurry with your little feet, and you can even leap to the upper jaw and run upside down‚Äîwhee, so cool!

The teeth in the mouth sing their own tunes. Healthy teeth ring long and clear‚Äîding-dong, like a tuning fork‚Äîbut they‚Äôre crawling with microbe colonies, tiny settlers giggling and building little dirt castles. You can eat them‚Äîthe bird loves these tasty microbes. Sick teeth, though, grumble short and sad‚Äîbzz-bzz, as if angry. But beware! Touch a sick tooth, and the crocodile snaps its jaws‚Äîsnap! Darkness swallows you, all goes quiet, and the crocodile sheds crocodile tears.

Your goal: be a nimble bird! Run across healthy teeth, gobble up microbes, jump to the upper jaw, flip upside down, but don‚Äôt touch the sick teeth. If you succeed, the crocodile will cheer up, open its mouth, and you‚Äôll dash out into the sunshine, where you both enjoy a happy life‚Äîwith clean teeth and joyful chirping!!!![TheCleaner.jpg](///raw/784/3/z/6b26a.jpg)

games.name: Iron Depths
games.body:
For better experience in full-screen, go to itch.io page in Links.

‚ÄãInstructions

Press RMB to enter "mouse mode". Use LMB or E to start interaction with highlighted elements such as buttons or levers. WSAD to walk.

Reactor produces power but also heats up. Hot areas on the map mean you need to manage where to allocate power more wisely or you will blow up. When the fuse blows, you need to restart the reactor.![cover.png](///raw/984/d2/z/6a501.png)

games.name: Slow Decline
games.body:
![Slow-decline-Logo-Header.png](///raw/2ac/b1/z/6a335.png)

>** *He curiously approached the hole.* **

>** *The voices ordered him to go further.* **

>** *And thus began his slow decline.* **

>** *‚ÄúThis Presence‚Ä¶ Something is calling me‚Ä¶ Onward now, don‚Äôt be hesitant.‚Äù* **

>** *He found himself in a realm of darkness, enveloped by an overwhelming foulness.* **


With this, your adventure begins. You're a Scientist and Explorer. Who is commanded by a strange force.
It calls you to go deep down in the depths and explore the dark realms of an unholy place filled with creatures.
But you are not helpless. As you explore, you uncover an ancient magic which helps you survive the depths.

Are you ready to explorer and prepared to die?

![GIF-GEGNER.gif](///raw/424/41/z/6a3ba.gif)![00-Gegner-GIF.gif](///raw/424/41/z/6a3c4.gif)

games.name: Into The Dungeon depths
games.body:
Umer is your usual ~~fat short drunk~~ dwarf who would do anything ~~for another bottle of boose~~ to experience spirit of adventure. This time he went into a dungeon for a promised unlimited supply of liqu.. gold at the very end of it. Of course no one has ever come back from the dungeon. But Umer will ... be no exception. At least let's prolongate his life on earth! Go as deep as you can![GOING.gif](///raw/868/15/z/6a3bc.gif)

Let's see what we have at our disposal for making it happen ü§î
- Weapons! A good variety!![WEAPONS.gif](///raw/868/15/z/6a3d5.gif)
- Potions‚Ñ¢ ! Very useful. (Now alcohol free!)![POTIONS.gif](///raw/868/15/z/6a3f3.gif)
- Armor! To withstand attacks from great evil in your way![ARMOR.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a3f9.png)

And what about that "great evil"? There are
- Skeletons! ![SKELETON.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a406.png)
- Slimes! ![SLIME.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a40c.png)
- Spiders! ![SPIDER.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a40f.png)
- AND ... mold..?![MOLD.png](///raw/868/15/z/6a414.png)

Controls: 
- mouse (with mouse you point Umer where to go)
- "r" key ("r" start over)
- "space" key ("space" start over or continue journey depending on circumstances)

Some rules:
- No turning back! Once you entered the room or went some distance in one you CANNOT return (that means you can't return to previous rooms AND you cannot go left)
- Poison effect will be removed once you leave the room where you got poisoning or once you drink one of three healing potions!
- Poison effects don't stack. The last one only will affect
- Umer will pick up every item in his way even if it's worse than the one he's already got
- To apply potion click on it in your inventory
- Weapons and armor are applied automatically
- To enter the room first make sure it's on your right. Then click on entry. Once Umer makes his way to entry click on the entry again!
- As I said you CANNOT return back!

games.name: Sun(d)less Descend
games.body:
40 years ago, the sky started to fall.
The pillars that held up the sky crumbled to dust. Underneath them, people found the depths.

It was said that the depths grants all wishes.

We only wished to survive.


-----


## Instruction

WASD - Move & Look

Mouse - Interact

games.name: The Depths of Gitche Gumee
games.body:
[Play our game in the browser on itch.io](https://dannyd1221.itch.io/the-depths-of-gitche-gumee)


![GGThumbnail.png](///raw/1f9/24/z/6ae14.png)

![sub_underwater.png](///raw/1f9/24/z/6ae80.png)

The year is 30XX. Climate catastrophe has struck the planet, the ice caps have melted, humanity has been pushed to the seas, and society has all but collapsed. Valuables from the Old World remain suspended in time below the surface, ripe for the taking to anyone with the right equipment. 

## Gameplay

The player controls an Orb-Ship submersible with the goal of exploring the waters of Gitche Gumee, a lake far to the north in the land once known as Michigan. Maneuver the Orb-Ship deep underwater in search of rare materials and special hidden valuables from the Old World. Return the cargo to the ship on the surface to collect money, buy upgrades for the Orb-Ship, and resupply. 

## Objective

Search the dark waters for the most valuable prize of all: the wreck of the SS Edmund Fitzgerald.

## Controls

WASD - Move

Hold Direction into block - Begin drilling/collect material

E - Opens the shop menu when surfaced

F - Toggle Flashlight

R - Toggle Sonar


Share your game stats in the comments below!

## The Game
"Moleman's Manhole Mayhem" is an action platformer where you play as moleman and fight your way to the bottom of the manhole to face a mole's ultimate adversary: a man with a hammer!  
![Moleman'sManholeMayhem.png](///raw/458/3/z/6a542.png)  

## How to play
* The top floor is a tutorial that explains all the gameplay mechanics.
* To unlock the manhole to the next floor you have to kill a sparkly enemy to drop the key

* Moleman is weak so try to attack enemies from behind when you can if you don't want to get hit!

games.name: Edge Digger
games.body:
# üïπÔ∏è Edge Digger
![ÂõæÂÉè_2025-04-07_195243026.png](///raw/b59/f5/z/6b2ea.png)

![ÂõæÂÉè_2025-04-07_195127347.png](///raw/b59/f5/z/6b2e2.png)


## üéÆ Game Controls
For survival, dig down as far as you can! Who knows, you PROBABLY can find yourself a safe spot down there, hehe!

- **Q/E** ‚Äî Dig Left/Right
- **Space** ‚Äî Dig Down
- **A/D** ‚Äî Move Left/Right
- **Mouse Left Click** ‚Äî UI Interaction

## ‚ú® About the Game
Hi everyone! It's my third Ludum Dare journey and it's a fabulous run. I brought an insane team with me this time:

- **@atoxigner**, our Lead Designer. His creative mindset helped detailized most of the game systems and implemented Audio for the game.
- **@ashe-liu**, our Technical Artist, she created fantastic post processing effects and some UI animation for the game.
- **@laine-lai**, our music composer / sound engineer, she single handedly carried our game audio. The music she made is worth millions.
- **@pppppppp**, our 3D artist, the arm model he created for our main menu and pause menu is insane. The first time I looked at it, I thought it's one of the heirloom from Apex Legends.
- **@shaozha**, our game programmer, most of the game systems are his coding work.
- **@xiaoxie33**, our Lead Artist, he created insane concept, environmental objects' animation, and UI elements for the team. We couldn't make it without him.
- **@xichan-zheng**, our 2D Artist, she created the cutest 2D character I've ever seen. All the smooth character animations are her artwork. She also designed GameOver menu and our cover page.
- Lastly it's me, **@arthur-tang**, I worked as a producer, programmer, and technical artist this time. I helped put everything together. Spent some time solving people's question or problem.

## üöÄ Play the Game
The WebGL format can be played on itch.io with the link down below.
You can also download the windows version here or on itch.io.

### üì• Download Instructions:
Download the zip file called EdgeDigger_winF, unzip it, get into EdgeDigger_win, and access the game by clicking at "Edge Digger.exe".

If you had fun playing this game, please leave a comment! It will be awesome if you can post the screenshot of your score here as well. Let's see who is the best Edge Digger!!!

games.name: Mousehold

Gather cheese before you get caught exploring _Mousehold_.

[Play on the Web](https://nbumgardner.itch.io/mousehold)

![level-1-preview.png](///raw/6a0/63/z/6a9aa.png)

## How to Play

Move with arrow controls or WASD keys:

- W: Up
- A: Left
- S: Down
- D: Right

Gather cheese and avoid chef cat's grasp on your way to the exit ladder, delving deeper into Mousehold.

## Credits

Mousehold was created with the Godot engine in 3 days and includes original code, sound, and art.

The full team included:

- Eya - artist
- Harmoen - programmer
- Noah Bumgardner - composer
- Shawna Bumgardner - cat's meow

Font - Roboto

## Feedback Wanted

This Ludum Dare entry features original art, music, and gameplay, and we are welcome to all kinds of feedback, especially related to how fun _Mousehold_ is to play!

You can also check out [the open-source code on GitHub](https://github.com/NBumgardner/ld-57-game).

Alone in a submarine, make your way through various rooms completing puzzles to move forwards.

---
## :video_game: [Play the game on itch.io!](https://willby.itch.io/enigmarine) :video_game:
---
